statements: SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT activity_name, description FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE image_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, location FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE location = 'Costa Rica';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_name ILIKE '%hiking%';
SELECT activity_name, description FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE image_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE description IS NULL ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_description FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_image_url FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(review_rating) AS average_rating FROM tourist_reviews WHERE activity_id = 5;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM tourist_reviews ORDER BY review_rating DESC, reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Hiking';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_image_url FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM tourist_reviews WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities JOIN tourist_reviews ON ecotourism_activities.activity_id = tourist_reviews.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM ecotourism_images WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE latitude > 45;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM ecotourism_images WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id > 5 ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE latitude < 10.5 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_description LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_location = 'Forest';
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email, full_name FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT u.full_name, r.rating, r.review_text FROM users u INNER JOIN reviews r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.activity_id = 3;
SELECT i.image_url, i.image_description, a.activity_name FROM images i INNER JOIN ecotourism_activities a ON i.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE a.activity_location = 'Forest';

SELECT r.rating, u.username, a.activity_name FROM reviews r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN ecotourism_activities a ON r.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY r.rating DESC, u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_url, uploaded_at FROM images WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT image_url FROM images WHERE activity_id = 2 ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, activity_id, uploaded_at FROM images WHERE activity_id = 3 AND uploaded_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT image_url FROM images JOIN activities ON images.activity_id = activities.activity_id WHERE activities.location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT image_url, activity_name FROM images JOIN activities ON images.activity_id = activities.activity_id;
SELECT ecotourist_id, name, email FROM ecotourists WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT activity_name, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM activities JOIN bookings ON activities.activity_id = bookings.activity_id GROUP BY activity_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
